actions.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Petri.
The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) and on the bill without objection.
On agreeing to the Petri amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute directs the Secretary of Transportation to issue, under an ongoing rulemaking proceeding, a rule relating to materials of trade exceptions to hazardous materials regulations.
purpose: An amendment to insert a complete new text.
